original_text: So they divided the land between them to pass throughout it: Ahab went one way by himself, and Obadiah went another way by himself.
korean_text: 두 사람이 두루 다닐 땅을 나누어 아합은 홀로 이 길로 가고 오바댜는 홀로 저 길로 가니라

sentences.original_text: So they divided the land between them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그들 사이의 땅을 나누었고

sentences.original_text: Ahab went one way by himself
and Obadiah went another way by himself
